talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
A ray of light in this endless darkness….

$Karacule$
Dragons are making troubles in many ways to people in the world. I'm worried about the natives.
Ah, didn't you say you were infected by black dragons' blood?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What do you think of the reason?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Karacule$
As you can see, normal people are far vulnerable to be changed monsters because of dragons' high infectiousness.
But in case of you…it seems the infection doesn't grow up fast.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Karacule is now lost in thought deeply.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Karacule$
It is hard for me to distinguish all diseases of people, even for the dragons too.
…Anyway you'd better keep you eyes on yourself. For yourself.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It might be because of my mother…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Karacule$
You got something in your mind? The reason why you are different from others.
…Never think about giving shit like Goddess's blessing.
I don't believe it.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I've heard my mother was a dark priestess.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Karacule$
Mother? You think this is somewhat related to your mother?
Pah, so you're going to say that you and your mother are one of dragons?

$Karacule$
A dark priestess? (Karacule shows incredulous looks.)Your mother is the protector of pledge?
Oh, I can’t believe the dark priestess gave birth.

$Karacule$
It's quite unsual. There was a never happening like that. Hmm… the dark priestess's boy comes to this religious place, this would be destiny. However, I can't grasp everything of the dark priestess's power even though I'm a Fairystar.
<html>$Miracle boy$</html>

$Karacule$
The border of darkness, Surpah You know how to get to the watchtower?
At there, you need to find Priestess of Darkness Castia.
This happening is related to them so go and ask them.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
What made you visit here in dark priestess's place? You are the priest following Artea Priestess in Light Land.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
…Your mother was a protector of pledge?
(Castia is a bit shaken up and in the meantime she looks him suspiciously)

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
We gave up living as a human to prevent spreading ofthe border of darkness
That…we never heard of that name.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
Eclair? …You, You are Eclair's…?
(Castia is lost in thought deeply)
I can't keep this back to you because you already know the name. But I can't just believe you right now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What kind of the test is it?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
{user_nick}didn't become an evil because of your relatedness with dark priestess' blood, even though you were contaminated by dragons' blood.
So sorry for that but, we need to test a little.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
The border of darkness Purify Pezadelo of Hatredwithin 10 rounds.
If you are the real successor of the special blood, you would get something while purifying it.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
Ah, you might know but if you want to enter Pezadelo of Hatred,Abyssal Veilis needed.

※ You can get Abyssal Veil from Priestess of Darkness Shoo.
※ When you complete the quest, you can get one Abyssal veil as a reward.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
Oh. You get the Impunity of Vanity
(Castia is surprised.)

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
Impunity of Vanity is generated when our guardians of pledge purify the border of darkness.
Our special constitution that prevents us from going back to the human world is making them when crashing the darkness energy.

$Priestess of Darkness Castia$
…Somehow you were right. You have the same attribute of priestess of darkness in some parts.
I can't believe Eclair's baby was survived and came back here….
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

qstep_change.comment: 다크레어 개편으로 인해 조건문 3 사용하지 않음

journal.title: To Priestess of Darkness Castia
journal.contents:
Go to Surpah's watchtower throughout the channel of Border of Darkness Surpah, let's talk with Priestess of Darkness Castia.

※ In the top right side of channel selection bar, you can select the channel of Border of Darkness Surpah and move on.

Border of Darkness Surpah Watchtower → Priestess of Darkness Castia
journal.destination: Talk with Priestess of Darkness Castia
journal.todo_msg: Talk with Priestess of Darkness Castia.

journal.title: Purify Pezadelo of Hatred
journal.contents:
To clear Priestess of Darkness Castia's doubt, purify Pezadelo of Hatred for more than 10 rounds.

※ It is recommended to make up 4 players in a party in Border of Darkness.
※ You need Abyssal Veil to enter Border of Darkness.
※ You can get Abyssal Veil from Priestess of Darkness Shoo.

Pezadelo's gate → Pezadelo of Hatred 10 rounds
journal.destination: Pezadelo of Hatred up to 10 rounds
journal.todo_msg: Purify Pezadelo of Hatred up to 10 rounds.

journal.title: Impunity of Vanity
journal.contents:
I got Impunity of Vanity. This will clear Priestess of Darkness Castia's doubt so let's deliver it to her.

Border of Darkness Surpah watchtower → Priestess of Darkness Castia
journal.destination: Talk with Priestess of Darkness Castia
journal.todo_msg: You got Impunity of Vanity. Report it to Priestess of Darkness Castia.
